communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

All A&A sheets or daily logs to account for personnel for the Bureau of Internal Affairs from June 20, 2022 until September 20, 2022.

All overtime reports for the Bureau of Internal Affairs from June 20, 2022 until September 20, 2022.

All approved overtime reports for the Bureau of Internal affairs from June 20, 2022 until September 20, 2022.  

All A&A sheets or daily logs to account for personnel for the Bureau of Internal Affairs from June 20, 2021 until September 20, 2021.

All overtime reports for the Bureau of Internal Affairs from June 20, 2021 until September 20, 2021.

All approved overtime reports for the Bureau of Internal affairs from June 20, 2021 until September 20, 2020.

All A&A sheets or daily logs to account for personnel for the Bureau of Internal Affairs from June 20, 2021 until September 20, 2020.

All overtime reports for the Bureau of Internal Affairs from June 20, 2021 until September 20, 2020.

All approved overtime reports for the Bureau of Internal affairs from June 20, 2021 until September 20, 2020.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

J publi
